name: Revival Blessing
effect: User targets a fainted ally, if successful, they're brought back with 3 HP. Reduce the user's current Will to 1. Cannot be used unless at full Will. If the user's max Will is 1 for any reason, this move fails.
description: The Pokémon bestows a loving blessing, reviving a party Pokémon that has fainted. This leaves it feeling pensive and drained for quite awhile.
